get.description: The "Check url slug" API allows check the blog slug validation which is needed before publishing any blog post. Please use blogs/check-slug.readonly. you can find the POST ID from the post edit url.

put.description: The "Update Blog Post" API allows you update blog post for any given blog site. Please use blogs/post-update.write

post.description: The "Create Blog Post" API allows you create blog post for any given blog site. Please use blogs/post.write

get.description: The "Get all authors" Api return the blog authors for a given location ID. Please use "blogs/author.readonly"

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of authors to show in the listing

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of authors to skip in listing

get.description: The "Get all categories" Api return the blog categoies for a given location ID. Please use "blogs/category.readonly"

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of categories to show in the listing

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of categories to skip in listing

get.summary: Get Blog posts by Blog ID
get.description: The "Get Blog posts by Blog ID" API allows you get blog posts for any given blog site using blog ID.Please use blogs/posts.readonly

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: search for any post by name

get.description: The "Get Blogs by Location ID" API allows you get blogs using Location ID.Please use blogs/list.readonly

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: search for any post by name

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Sub-Account (OR) Private Integration Token of Sub-Account.

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Agency (OR) Private Integration Token of Agency.

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

exists.description: Indicates whether the url slug exists or not

blogId.description: You can find the blog id from blog site dashboard link

imageAltText.example: Alt text for your blog image

categories.description: This needs to be array of category ids, which you can get from the category get api call.

author.description: This needs to be author id, which you can get from the author get api call.

updatedBlogPost.description: Object containing response data of blog post update

blogId.description: You can find the blog id from blog site dashboard link

status.example: This can be PUBLISHED OR SCHEDULED OR ARCHIVED OR DRAFT

imageAltText.example: Alt text for your blog image

categories.description: This needs to be array of category ids, which you can get from the category get api call.

author.description: This needs to be author id, which you can get from the author get api call.

data.description: Object containing response data of blog post create.
Object containing response data of blog

blogs.description: Object containing response data of blog posts

categories.description: Array of category IDs associated with the blog post

tags.description: Array of tags associated with the blog post

archived.description: Indicates whether the blog post is archived

_id.description: Unique identifier of the blog post

title.example: Banana is good source of energy

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the blog post

status.description: Publication status of the blog post

imageAltText.description: Alternative text for the blog post image

urlSlug.description: URL slug for the blog post

canonicalLink.description: Canonical link of the blog post

author.description: Identifier of the author of the blog post

publishedAt.description: Timestamp when the blog post was published

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the blog post was last updated
